title: KUMAR REALTY LIGHT HOUSE
detail: Kumar Realty Lighthouse offers a refined living experience with its 2 BHK homes, designed for modern living and comfort. These thoughtfully crafted residences feature spacious layouts, contemporary finishes, and elegant interiors. Enjoy premium amenities such as high-quality flooring, modern fixtures, and a well-planned design that enhances daily living. Kumar Realty Lighthouse combines style and practicality, providing a perfect blend of comfort and sophistication in every home.
developer_detail: Kumar World is a leading Indian real estate developer with over four decades of experience, renowned for innovation, design excellence, and customer-centricity. They have delivered numerous landmark projects in major Indian cities.With over 57 years of industry expertise, Kumar World is a well-established and trusted name in Pune's real estate market.
city_description: Discover a thriving urban lifestyle in Hadapsar, Pune's eastern gem. Enjoy seamless connectivity to major IT hubs, educational institutions, and lifestyle destinations. Experience a vibrant community with modern amenities, diverse residential options, and a rapidly expanding infrastructure. Your dream home awaits in this dynamic and well-connected locale.
